The loss of your baby

179
Help and support
If your baby dies during 
pregnancy or shortly after 
birth, you will need both 
information and support. 
Each Trust has a bereavement 
coordinator and bereavement 
midwife who can support 
you and also put you in 
touch with other people and 
organisations who can help 
you. More information can 
also be found on your Trust 
website  by searching for
